Your New Ritual
settings.text: JCOS formulas are all cross-functional. They add moisture, create volume and texture, and promote hair and scalp health. Making them especially helpful for managing difficult hair. Each JCOS product can be used independently or as part of a multi-step application to achieve exceptional results.

settings.title: International
settings.text: We are currently shipping to the EU, USA, and Canada, but please email us to request shipment to the country of your choice. We will happily add it to our system upon verification. Please check our shipping page for more details.

settings.title: Order tracking
settings.text:
After payment is confirmed, we generally ship from our New Jersey warehouse within 24 to 48 hours. Orders placed on weekends and holidays will be processed on the next business day. Most orders will be delivered in 1-3 business days.

Estimated standard shipment
rate is 10 USD, but it will be calculated precisely at checkout.

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.text: We’re here to help. Feel free to email us at hello@myjcos.com or send us a message through our social media accounts for product recommendations and consultations.

settings.title: Can I cancel/modify my order after it is placed?
settings.text: To change your order, please email us immediately and include your order #. Unfortunately, once an order has been processed, we can not modify or cancel your order.

settings.title: Are your products safe for color-treated hair?
settings.text: Crafted with sulfate-free surfactants, our shampoos, conditioners, primers, masks, and oils are safe for color treated hair.

settings.title: How can I be sure your products are safe?
settings.text: Your health and safety are our number one concern, so we’ve carefully selected every ingredient to ensure the safety and performance of our products. Our commitment to safety and care means that every product is carefully checked and assessed, adhering to all internationally recognized standards. We’ve also conducted rigorous safety assurance processes designed to meet or exceed industry and regulatory standards for personal care products.

settings.title: What makes Japanese hair products different from Korean hair products?
settings.text: Korean products focus on answering immediate hair concerns and offer wow effects, whereas the Japanese philosophy is based on prevention and sustained results. Korean beauty follows the hottest trends of the moment, while Japanese beauty has its roots in long-lasting and proven rituals and traditions. Korean beauty embraces a faster pace, while Japanese beauty focuses on a slower-paced way of life, believing that breathing, contemplating, and mindfulness should be embraced.

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.description: Our products are gentle, effective and completely clean.

settings.title: Reusable Packaging
settings.text: Our bottles are all refillable so they're even friendly on the environment.

settings.title: made in Japan
settings.text: Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, our formulas exceed the highest quality standards on the planet.

settings.title: uniquely you
settings.text: You deserve to enjoy haircare that truly works. So we’ve made it easy to create a customized routine that fits your individual hair type.

settings.title: all natural
settings.text: We only include plant-based, and eco-friendly ingredients proven to support the skin and hair.

settings.title: non-toxic
settings.text: We never use any synthetic dyes, mineral oil, parabéns, petroleum surfactants, silicon, talc, or sulfates. Ever.

settings.title: From the Japanese word Chōwa
settings.description: We celebrate the beauty of life and harmony with nature.

settings.title: Crafted with Kindness, Created with Care, Bringing Holistic J Beauty Culture – and the Moments that Matter – to Women Everywhere.
settings.text:
The JCOS line of purposeful and innovative lifestyle products was created to introduce J-Beauty culture to women across the globe, regardless of age, race, or ethnicity. Our products are gentle, effective, and pure, uniting beauty with sustainability without compromise.
Eco-conscious to the core, our ingredients are always responsibly sourced and never tested on animals. Designed to rejoice in the beauty of the moment, while keeping an eye on future generations, our refillable and recyclable packaging, made from organic and sustainable materials, reflect our core beliefs and deep respect for the planet.

settings.title: Zen-inspired, organized life is the primary ingredient incorporated into every JCOS product line.
settings.text: JCOS was born from a desire to share the simplistic and ritualistic traditions Japanese women have practiced for centuries, combining the naturally healing properties of the earth with 21st century innovations in hair and skincare with women everywhere. Intertwining an all-inclusive “by-women-for-women” philosophy with the uniquely Japanese perspective that a life of cleanliness and simplicity, focusing on a balance of inner and outer well-being, creates a harmonious relationship between the senses and the soul. Inviting women to bring a little Zen into their typically dull, rushed, and stress-filled lives.

A brand-new concept in beauty care, encouraging women to take a little me time out of the everyday to rejuvenate, reflect, and nurture.

 

JCOS is much more than just another personal lifestyle brand. Incorporating the Asian philosophy of quieting the mind, taking it slow, and using time intentionally through daily rituals to cultivate health and inner peace is the JCOS vision. All products in our range are designed and carefully selected to bring balance and beauty to the lives of women of every age, race, and ethnicity.

settings.title: JCOS  by Sentique International
settings.description: US-based, Sentique International, proudly presents sister company JCOS, (Japanese Cosmetics) a holistic, purposeful, and innovative lifestyle brand, created to introduce ritual-based Japanese beauty culture to the women of North America. Wishing you peace – wherever you are.

settings.title: Our Products
settings.description:
JCOS products are PH balanced, so they’re gentle and effective. With never any synthetic dyes, mineral oil, parabéns, petroleum surfactants, silicon, talc, or sulfates. Ever. Just clean haircare in harmony with the environment.
Our multistep formulas offer customizable solutions to individual hair needs because we believe everyone deserves to enjoy a routine that truly works.

settings.html: Once you write some HTML, it will render right here.

settings.title: Moshi Moshi
settings.description: We are JCOS, and we are obsessed with Japanese beauty. So much so that we took ourselves to Japan, sourced the absolute best products, and brought them home to share with you! They're gentle, yet effective and completely clean. Our bottles are all refillable so they're even gentle on the environment. We hope you love them as much as we do!

settings.title: What is JCOS?
settings.content: JCOS stands for Japanese Cosmetics, and we’re obsessed with Japanese beauty. Born from a desire to share the simplistic and ritualistic traditions Japanese women have practiced for centuries with women everywhere is what JCOS is all about. Intertwining an all-inclusive “by-women-for-women” philosophy with the uniquely Japanese perspective that a life of cleanliness and simplicity, focusing on a balance of inner and outer well-being, creates a harmonious relationship between the senses and the soul. The JCOS line of purposeful and innovative lifestyle products was created to introduce Asian beauty culture to women across the globe, regardless of age, race, or ethnicity. Eco-conscious to the core, JCOS products are made with responsibly sourced natural resources, and never tested on animals. Designed to rejoice in the beauty of the moment, while keeping an eye on future generations, our products are made from organic and sustainable materials, reflecting our core beliefs and deep respect for the planet.

settings.title: What makes Japanese hair products different from Korean hair products?
settings.content:
Korean products focus on answering immediate hair concerns and offer wow effects, whereas the Japanese philosophy is based on prevention and sustained results.

Korean beauty follows the hottest trends of the moment, while Japanese beauty has its roots in long-lasting and proven rituals and traditions.

Korean beauty embraces a faster pace, while Japanese beauty focuses on a slower-paced way of life, believing that breathing, contemplating,  and mindfulness should be embraced.

settings.title: I’m an American caucasian woman. Can I use your products on my hair?
settings.content:
Yes.

Our products were originally created for Asian hair types, but our universal formulas work for all hair types, including color-treated hair.

settings.title: Do JCOS products contain sulfates?
settings.content: JCOS shampoos and conditioners are free from sulfated surfactants, parabens, and artificial ingredients.

settings.title: I have an oily scalp, but my hair is dry and brittle from bleaching it so many times. Which JCOS collection should I use for my hair type?
settings.content:
JCOS products were designed to help you look your best regardless of  hair type, but some are better for certain concerns. For your hair type, we’d recommend using our claynal line. Over-cleansing to control excessive oil production in the scalp can leave hair dry, brittle and noticeably damaged. Our proprietary “Amino-Clay Formula” blends organic white clay, natural humin extract, and amino acids to activate detoxifying and healing properties in the scalp, removing impurities and excess oil, leaving a clean slate for hair to grow, and become nourished, smoother, and silkier. 

You can also mix and match our products for added benefits. Our Cafe Latte line is ideal for every hair type.  Our & honey line is excellent for split ends and dry, damaged hair as well.

settings.title: My hair is very dry and tends to be frizzy. Which JCOS line would be best for my hair?
settings.content:
Our Ahola Butter line is excellent for thick, dry, and frizzy hair. Formulated from an ancient Japanese secret to the shiniest hair on earth, creamy butters and soothing herbal milk smooth thick, frizzy, and unruly hair leaving it glossy and silky.

 

Our & honey line is also excellent for dry hair. Like a refreshing and soothing sip of tea with honey, this luxurious and transformative honey based humectant cleanses hair without weighing it down or stripping it of its natural oils. Honey is the most hydrating ingredient on earth, and we’ve combined three different honey formulas in out & honey line.

settings.title: Do you carry hair masks?
settings.content: Our claynal SMOOTH SPA MASK relaxes and rejuvenates while detoxifying the scalp and moisturizing the hair. Botanicals and herbal extracts are released to create a relaxing, zen-like experience of the senses as lackluster hair becomes glossy, silky, and healthy. White clay surrounds every strand, allowing cashmere keratin, amino acids, and pure silk to penetrate the hair shaft from root to end, nourishing and repairing dry, brittle, and damaged hair after just one use.

settings.title: Are your products safe for color-treated hair?
settings.content: Crafted with sulfate-free surfactants, our shampoos, conditioners, primers, masks, and oils are safe for color treated hair.

settings.title: Can I cancel/modify my order after it is placed?
settings.content: To change your order, please email us immediately and include your order #. Unfortunately, once an order has been processed, we can not modify or cancel your order.

settings.title: Do you test on animals?
settings.content: Never! We never test on our furry friends.

settings.title: There are too many products to choose from! How can I decide which is best for me?
settings.content: We’re here to help. Feel free to email us or send us a message through our social media accounts for product recommendations and consultations.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.content: We are currently shipping to the EU, USA, and Canada, but please email us to request shipment to the country of your choice. We will happily add it to our system upon verification.  Please check our shipping page for more details.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, JCB, Discover, and Diners Club debit/credit cards, PayPal express checkout and Apple Pay.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.content: After payment is confirmed, we generally ship from our California warehouse within 24 to 48 hours. Orders placed on weekends and holidays will be processed on the next business day. Most orders will be delivered in 1-3 business days.

settings.title: What if I didn't find my question here?
settings.content: If you have a question that’s not answered in our FAQs, we want to hear it. Simply send your question via our Contact US page or find us on social!

settings.title: Is my information secure?
settings.content: You can be assured that personal information collected through this site is secure. Please read our Privacy Policy to learn more.

settings.title: How can I be sure your products are safe?
settings.content:
Your health and
safety are our number one concern, so we’ve carefully selected every ingredient to ensure the safety and performance of
our products.

Our commitment to safety and care means that every product is carefully checked and
assessed, adhering to all internationally
recognized standards. We’ve also conducted rigorous
safety assurance processes designed to meet or exceed industry and regulatory
standards for personal care products.

 

To maintain 100%
transparency, a complete list of ingredients is always listed on each product
label.

settings.title: Ahalo Butter
settings.text: Ahalo Butter is one of our carefully selected japanese hair products. Even healthy and strong hair quickly deteriorates through improper care, colouring, bleaching or straightening. Regular shampoo and conditioner may be not enough. That is why you should trust Japanese hair care cosmetics that are enriched with potent ingredients like rice protein, seaweed, camellia oil, etc. These products are devoid of harmful chemicals, reduce static, and tame frizz and flyaways. On our site, you can buy the best quality Japanese hair care of all kinds - moisturizing, conditioning or strengthening sets that will improve your overall hair health.
settings.button_text: Treat your hair with Japanese hair care!

settings.title: Upsell tags
settings.raw_content:
Tag this product with an _upsell tag to show an upsell for a related product. The _upsell tag uses the name in the product link, called a handle, to show a one-click buy link for a product that customers may also like.

The product handle is just the name shown in the link to a product. A necklace at /products/necklace would have the handle necklace. A ring at /products/signet-ring-gold would have the handle signet-ring-gold.

You can tag this product with _upsell_necklace to show the necklace goes well with this product.

Learn more

settings.title: Unique tab content
settings.raw_content:
Sometimes you want product tabs that are unique to each product. You can split your product description into unique tab content by adding H6 headings between the paragraphs you want to split into tabs.

For example, if you have a paragraph about sizing, you would add an H6 heading with the word 'Size' above that paragraph.

The tab heading would be 'Size' and the tab content would be everything below the word Size.

Learn more
